creditline: Gift of Janice Lea Lurie in honor of Irene F. Lurie
description: 3 riders on horseback at center with dog and bird flying in distance; rim decorated with 3 riders in countryside, with bare trees; pea green ground
inscription:
Mark, Inscription and Signature

On front, below central image, in black glaze: [The Fallowfield Hunt the Start]
markings: On bottom, in black glaze: (buffalo surmounting a sign)/MADE AT/YE/BUFFALO POTTERY/19/09/DELDARE WARE/UNDERGLAZE]
title: Plate with Hunting Scene
